instructions.name: call
docs: Calls a contract on ZetaChain zEVM.
* `receiver` - The Ethereum address of the receiver on ZetaChain zEVM.
* `message` - The message passed to the contract.
* `revert_options` - The revert options created by the caller.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the call.

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Deposits SOL into the program and credits the `receiver` on ZetaChain zEVM.
* `amount` - The amount of lamports to deposit.
* `receiver` - The Ethereum address of the receiver on ZetaChain zEVM.
* `revert_options` - The revert options created by the caller.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the deposit.

instructions.name: deposit_and_call
docs: Deposits SOL and calls a contract on ZetaChain zEVM.
* `amount` - The amount of lamports to deposit.
* `receiver` - The Ethereum address of the receiver on ZetaChain zEVM.
* `message` - The message passed to the contract.
* `revert_options` - The revert options created by the caller.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the deposit.

instructions.name: deposit_spl_token
docs: Deposits SPL tokens and credits the `receiver` on ZetaChain zEVM.
* `amount` - The amount of SPL tokens to deposit.
* `receiver` - The Ethereum address of the receiver on ZetaChain zEVM.
* `revert_options` - The revert options created by the caller.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the deposit.

accounts.name: whitelist_entry
docs: The whitelist entry account for the SPL token.

accounts.name: mint_account
docs: The mint account of the SPL token being deposited.

accounts.name: from
docs: The source token account owned by the signer.

accounts.name: to
docs: The destination token account owned by the PDA.

instructions.name: deposit_spl_token_and_call
docs: Deposits SPL tokens and calls a contract on ZetaChain zEVM.
* `amount` - The amount of SPL tokens to deposit.
* `receiver` - The Ethereum address of the receiver on ZetaChain zEVM.
* `message` - The message passed to the contract.
* `revert_options` - The revert options created by the caller.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the deposit.

accounts.name: whitelist_entry
docs: The whitelist entry account for the SPL token.

accounts.name: mint_account
docs: The mint account of the SPL token being deposited.

accounts.name: from
docs: The source token account owned by the signer.

accounts.name: to
docs: The destination token account owned by the PDA.

instructions.name: execute
docs: Withdraws amount to destination program pda, and calls on_call on destination program
* `data` - Arbitrary data to pass to the destination program.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the deposit.

instructions.name: execute_revert
docs: Withdraws amount to destination program pda, and calls on_revert on destination program
* `amount` - The amount of SOL to withdraw.
* `data` - Data to pass to destination program.
* `recovery_id` - The recovery ID for signature verification.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the deposit.

instructions.name: execute_spl_token
docs: Withdraws amount of SPL tokens to destination program pda, and calls on_call on destination program
* `amount` - The amount of tokens to withdraw.
* `data` - Data to pass to destination program.
* `recovery_id` - The recovery ID for signature verification.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the withdrawal.

accounts.name: pda_ata
docs: The associated token account for the Gateway PDA.

accounts.name: mint_account
docs: The mint account of the SPL token being withdrawn.

accounts.name: destination_program_pda_ata
docs: The destination program associated token account.

instructions.name: execute_spl_token_revert
docs: Withdraws SPL token amount to destination program pda, and calls on_revert on destination program
* `amount` - The amount of tokens to withdraw.
* `data` - Data to pass to destination program.
* `recovery_id` - The recovery ID for signature verification.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the withdrawal.

accounts.name: pda_ata
docs: The associated token account for the Gateway PDA.

accounts.name: mint_account
docs: The mint account of the SPL token being withdrawn.

accounts.name: destination_program_pda_ata
docs: The destination program associated token account.

instructions.name: increment_nonce
docs: Increments nonce, used by TSS in case outbound fails.
* `recovery_id` - The recovery ID for signature verification.
* `failure_reason` - The reason for the failure of original outbound.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer incrementing nonce.

instructions.name: initialize
docs: * `chain_id` - The chain ID associated with the PDA.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer initializing the program.

instructions.name: reset_nonce
docs: Resets the PDA nonce. Caller is authority stored in PDA.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer performing the update.

instructions.name: set_deposit_paused
docs: Pauses or unpauses deposits. Caller is authority stored in PDA.
* `deposit_paused` - Boolean flag to pause or unpause deposits.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer performing the update.

instructions.name: unwhitelist_spl_mint
docs: Unwhitelists an SPL token. Caller is TSS.
* `recovery_id` - The recovery ID for signature verification.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The account of the authority performing the operation.

accounts.name: whitelist_entry
docs: The whitelist entry account being closed.

accounts.name: whitelist_candidate
docs: The mint account of the SPL token being unwhitelisted.

instructions.name: update_authority
docs: Updates the PDA authority. Caller is authority stored in PDA.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer performing the update.

instructions.name: update_tss
docs: Updates the TSS address. Caller is authority stored in PDA.
* `tss_address` - The new Ethereum TSS address (20 bytes).

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer performing the update.

instructions.name: whitelist_spl_mint
docs: Whitelists a new SPL token. Caller is TSS.
* `recovery_id` - The recovery ID for signature verification.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The account of the authority performing the operation.

accounts.name: whitelist_entry
docs: The whitelist entry account being initialized.

accounts.name: whitelist_candidate
docs: The mint account of the SPL token being whitelisted.

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: * `amount` - The amount of SOL to withdraw.
* `recovery_id` - The recovery ID for signature verification.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the withdrawal.

accounts.name: recipient
docs: The recipient account for the withdrawn SOL.

instructions.name: withdraw_spl_token
docs: Withdraws SPL tokens. Caller is TSS.
* `amount` - The amount of tokens to withdraw.
* `recovery_id` - The recovery ID for signature verification.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account of the signer making the withdrawal.

accounts.name: pda_ata
docs: The associated token account for the Gateway PDA.

accounts.name: mint_account
docs: The mint account of the SPL token being withdrawn.

accounts.name: recipient
docs: The recipient account for the withdrawn tokens.

types.name: Pda
docs: PDA account storing program state and settings.

fields.name: nonce
docs: The nonce to ensure each signature can only be used once.

fields.name: chain_id
docs: The chain ID associated with the PDA.

fields.name: deposit_paused
docs: Flag to indicate whether deposits are paused.

types.name: RevertOptions
docs: * `abort_address` Address to receive funds if aborted.
* `call_on_revert` Flag if on_revert hook should be called.
* `revert_message` Arbitrary data sent back in on_revert.

types.name: WhitelistEntry
docs: Whitelist entry account for whitelisted SPL tokens.
